key.name: default-show-terminal
key.summary: Is Nautilus Terminal visible in new Nautilus windows

key.name: use-custom-command
key.summary: Execute a custom command instead of the default shell
key.description: Executes the custom command defined in "custom-command" in the terminal instead of the user's default shell.

key.name: custom-command
key.summary: Custom command to execute instead of the default shell
key.description: The custom command to execute instead of the default user's shell when "use-default-command" is set to "true".

key.name: min-terminal-height
key.summary: Minimal height of the terminal (in line)
key.description: Minimal amount of line that will be visible in the terminal. Also the default amount of line visible when opening a new terminal.

key.name: terminal-bottom
key.description: Nautilus Terminal will be shown at the bottom of the windows
